mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (boardCategoryId, writer, title, content, regDate, price, deadline, isAuction, isLend, interestCnt, hits, lendDate, returnDate, itemName, itemImage1, itemImage2, itemImage3, itemCategoryId, latitude, longitude, isMegaphone, maxPrice) VALUES (#{boardCategoryId}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), #{price}, #{deadline}, #{isAuction}, #{isLend}, #{interestCnt}, #{hits}, #{lendDate}, #{returnDate}, #{itemName}, #{itemImage1}, #{itemImage2}, #{itemImage3}, #{itemCategoryId}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{isMegaphone}, #{maxPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Board ORDER BY isMegaphone DESC, interestCnt DESC, regDate DESC;
